scoringPlays.text: Irv Smith Jr. 76 Yd pass from Tua Tagovailoa (Joseph Bulovas Kick)
Tua Tagovailoa pass complete to Irv Smith Jr. for 47 yds, fumble recovered by Henry Ruggs III for a 12 Yd TD (Joseph Bulovas Kick)
Josh Jacobs 1 Yd Run (Joseph Bulovas Kick)
Cheyenne O'Grady 8 Yd pass from Ty Storey (Connor Limpert Kick)
Jerry Jeudy 42 Yd pass from Tua Tagovailoa (Joseph Bulovas Kick)
Cheyenne O'Grady 3 Yd pass from Cole Kelley (Connor Limpert Kick)
Damien Harris 2 Yd Run (Joseph Bulovas PAT failed)
Jerry Jeudy 60 Yd pass from Tua Tagovailoa (Joseph Bulovas Kick)
Damien Harris 1 Yd Run (Joseph Bulovas Kick)
Shyheim Carter 44 Yd Interception Return (Joseph Bulovas Kick)
De'Vion Warren 17 Yd pass from Ty Storey (Connor Limpert Kick)
Brian Robinson Jr. 5 Yd Run (Joseph Bulovas Kick)
Cole Kelley 1 Yd Run (Connor Limpert Kick)

videos.description: Tua Tagovailoa swings a pass out to Irv Smith Jr., who races 76 yards up the sideline for a quick Alabama touchdown.
videos.headline: Alabama's first play goes 76 yards for TD

videos.description: Alabama's Isaiah Buggs strips Arkansas quarterback Ty Storey and jumps on the loose ball for the Crimson Tide.
videos.headline: Alabama's Buggs strips Arkansas QB, recovers fumble

videos.description: Tua Tagovailoa completes a pass to Irv Smith Jr., who fumbles, but Henry Ruggs III picks it up and rolls into the end zone.
videos.headline: Alabama recovers own fumble for TD

videos.description: Jalen Hurts lines up at quarterback and runs a draw for a 27-yard run through the Arkansas defense.
videos.headline: Hurts scrambles for 27-yard gain

videos.description: Josh Jacobs plunges across the goal line from a yard out to put Alabama up 21-0 over Arkansas.
videos.headline: Jacobs' TD makes it 21-0 Alabama

videos.description: Ty Storey gets knocked down but hits tight end Cheyenne O'Grady for an 8-yard touchdown to put Arkansas on the board vs. Alabama.
videos.headline: Storey hits O'Grady for Arkansas TD

videos.description: Tua Tagovailoa airs out a deep pass to Jerry Jeudy in the end zone for a 42-yard Alabama touchdown.
videos.headline: Tagovailoa launches deep TD pass

videos.description: Cole Kelley looks to run, but darts a pass to Cheyenne O'Grady from three yards out to cut into Alabama's lead.
videos.headline: O'Grady catches 2nd TD for Arkansas

videos.description: Ty Storey connects with Deon Stewart downfield for a 37-yard gain, leading to an Arkansas touchdown later in the drive.
videos.headline: Arkansas WR Stewart leaps for 37-yard grab

videos.description: Tua Tagovailoa throws a short pass to Jerry Jeudy, who outruns Arkansas for his second touchdown of the game to extend Alabama's lead.
videos.headline: Jeudy turns short pass into 60-yard TD

videos.description: Damien Harris leaps over the top and reaches the ball over the goal line for an Alabama touchdown, extending the Crimson Tide's lead to 48-14.
videos.headline: Harris goes over the pile for TD

videos.description: Ty Storey's pass is tipped into the air and Shyheim Carter takes the interception 44 yards for another Alabama touchdown.
videos.headline: Alabama takes INT 44 yards to the house

videos.description: Tua Tagovailoa passes for 334 yards and four touchdowns to lead No. 1 Alabama to a dominant 65-31 win over Arkansas.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Tua, Alabama make easy work of Arkansas) 2018/10/6 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tua, Alabama make easy work of Arkansas

receiver.receiver_player_name: Chase Hayden, broken up by Deionte Thompson
La'Michael Pettway, broken up by Xavier McKinney
